DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if cryotherapy can effectively decrease the rate of neuropathy in patients undergoing weekly paclitaxel treatments.
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Paclitaxel Neuropathy With Cryotherapy
